name: Special Forces Commando:Duty S
description:
Special Forces Commando:Duty Survival is the best awaited game of US army frontline soldiers against terrorists. You have to build a strong defensive shield in warfare strike for the survival of most esteemed citizen .US army has trained special mountain sniper to make sure the continuous sniper shooting.
Features:
=> Best shooting game
=> Realistic battlefield
=> Thrilling missions
=> Precise controls
=> Console quality visuals
